title: 99% Invisible-47- US Postal Service Stamps
description: Somebody might be able to do a great painting that’s 20 x 30 inches, but you take that down to 1 x 1.5 inches, and it’s a challenge to make it work. -Ethel Kessler, Art Director for USPS Stamp Services … Continue reading →
author: roman@99pi.org (Roman Mars)
